metadata.title: CVE-2024-23226 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS 10.4,tvOS 17.4. Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
